manufacturer: Zhengzhou Winsen Electronics Technology Co., Ltd
description: Semiconductor gas sensor based on SnO2, sensitive to flammable gases such as propane, natural gas, smoke, and other flammable vapors. Provides a variable output voltage proportional to gas concentration.

specifications.operating_voltage: Heater: 5.0 V ± 0.1 V (AC or DC); Loop: ≤24 V DC
specifications.interface: Output voltage Vs: 2.5 V–4.0 V (at 2000 ppm C3H8)
other: Heater resistance RH: 29 Ω ± 3 Ω (room temperature)

power.supply_voltage_range: Heater: 5 V ± 0.1 V; Loop: ≤24 V DC

pins.GND: Pins 4 & 6 (testing electrodes, connected to ground in test circuit)
pins.Data: Pins 1 & 3 (output voltage across load resistor RL)

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect heater voltage (5 V ± 0.1 V) to pins 2 & 5, connect load resistor RL between pins 1 & 3, and connect pins 4 & 6 to ground. Supply loop voltage (≤24 V DC) to the load resistor. Measure output voltage across RL.

company_info.name: Zhengzhou Winsen Electronics Technology Co., Ltd
company_info.address: No.299, Jinsuo Road, National Hi-Tech Zone, Zhengzhou 450001 China

source_document: Flammable Gas Sensor (Model: MQ-2) Manual, Version 1.5, Valid from 2018-04-01
